There were six STV elections for Greater Wellington Regional Council in 2019.

One seat elected from two candidates in one iteration.

## Lower Hutt Constituency

Three seats elected from six candidates in five iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374370623" width="640" height="361" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## Porirua-Tawa Constituency

Two seats elected from seven candidates in six iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374373703" width="640" height="384" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## Upper Hutt Constituency

One seat elected from four candidates in three iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374373873" width="640" height="308" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## Wairarapa Constituency

One seat elected from three candidates in two iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374373928" width="640" height="282" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## Wellington Constituency

Five seats elected from 23 candidates in 29 iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374371069" width="640" height="793" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>
